history: Example JSON file. Copy and adjust for your needs and update the history
svnInfo_comment: Information automatically updated by SVN -- please don't edit

study.comment: Parameters that specify the study. Used by framework and not by optimisation routines

covariance.comment: Covariance matrices and operations on them. If CovObsErr and CovIntVar are *both* specified then CovTotal will be computed from them
covariance.CovTotal_Comment: Name of file containing Covariance Matrix for total Error.
covariance.CovIntVar_Comment: Name of file containing Covariance Matrix of Internal Variability
covariance.CovObsErr_Comment: Name of file containing Covariance Matrix for Observational Error

study.ParamList_Comment: List of Parameters that Algorithm Adjusts.
study.ObsList_Comment: List of Observations that Algorithm Uses

begin.firstOptimiseStep_comment: First optimisation step to run. Depends on algorithm you are using

paramValues.comment: Initial Values for optimisation. Only uses those ones specified in ParamList and if not specified default value is used.
paramValues.example_use: Example values are DEFAULT values. Delete ones you want at default values or set null and provide values for the ones you want set differently. Documented in standardModel

optimise.comment: Parameters to control optimisation. This is used within optimisation routines AND not by framework
optimise.algorithm_comment: Algorithm tells what each iteration does with parameters relevant below
optimise.sigma_comment: Have constraint on (sigma >= 1) or off (sigma <1). Might be better as true/false
optimise.covar_cond_comment: This might be a property of the covariance matrices and so moved to that block in the config file
optimise.prob_int_comment: Critical Probability that new state is consistent with old state for termination.
optimise.prob_obs_comment: Critical Probability that new state is consistent with Observations for termination.

postProcess.comment: Options to control post processing. Details depend on your post processing script.
postProcess.script_comment: Full path name -- including any environment variables you might have -- to postprocessing script
postProcess.note: Specify mask_file -- file where l/s mask is, name of mask, start and end times
postProcess.start_time_comment: Start time as YY,MM, DD, Hr, Min, Sec
postProcess.end_time_comment: End time as YY,MM, DD, Hr, Min, Sec

constraint_note: Name of constraint variable -- constraint_target in study defines the target value.

minmax.comment: Defines the minimum and maximmum ranges for the parameters

steps.comment: Steps for perturbations -- norm around 10% of the range

scalings.comment: Scalings on observables -- only defined when not 1.0

paramValues.CW_LAND_comment: Seed parameter which also affects CW_SEA
paramValues.DYNDIFF_comment: Seed parameter which affects DIFF_COEFF, DIFF_COEFF_Q, DIFF_EXP & DIFF_EXP_Q
paramValues.KAY_GWAVE_comment: Seed parameter which also affects KAY_LEE_GWAVE
paramValues.CHARNOCK_comment: Note this is Murphy et al, 200X and is different from that reported in Yamazaki et al, 2013
paramValues.ALPHAM_comment: Seed parameter which affects DTICE and ALPHAM

SimulatedValues.comment: Values from Initial Cond ensemble -- used for display
